summary: 2014 JAYCO PINNACLE 5TH WHEEL CAMPER HAD UNDISCLOSED FRAME DAMAGE RESULTING IN 20 OF 27 REPAIR ITEMS RELATED TO STRUCTURAL INTEGRITY AND SAFETY ISSUES. UPON DISCOVERY OF WELDED AND PAINT PATCH WORK, NO ADMISSION OF DAMAGE FROM AN ACCIDENT IS RECORDED OR REVEALED TO US.THIS UNIT IS NOT SAFE FOR TRAVEL OR HUMAN LIVING QUARTERS.  ***NOTE BELOW*** DAMAGE WAS PRIOR TO OUR PURCHASE DATE SO WE DO NOT HAVE THE DATE OF ACCIDENT.  *TR  *JS

WHILE TRAVELING SOUTH ON I495 IN MASSACHUSSETTS AT 65 MILES PER HOUR WE EXPERIENCED A TIRE FAILURE OF THE LEFT REAR TIRE ON OUR 2014 JAYCO PINNACLE. THIS TIRE IS A POWER KING TOWMAX ST235 80R16. THIS TIRE HAS NO MORE THAN 2500 MILES ON IT. THOUGH NO INJURY TO MY WIFE OR ME, AS A RESULT OF THIS FAILURE AND SHREDDING OF THE TIRE THE DAMAGE TO OUR 5TH WHEEL INCLUDED A DESTROYED RIM, REAR WHEEL FENDER FLAIR, WHEEL WELL, AND REAR SLIDE OUT SKIRTING AND MOLDING. GIVEN THAT OTHERS HAVE EXPERIENCED THE SAME THING THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL ON THESE TIRES.
